name: Super Retro Race
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:
Steering: Left and Right arrows
Accelerate: Right Shift
Brake: Release Right Shift
Nitro: Space

Game under development

Super Retro Race is a game based on the retro style of the 80's. It brings a vision of how the people of that era imagined the future, we combine this with the musical genres retrowave and synthwave are references of games like TopGear 2 and 3000
